[docs]def wait30s():
    time.sleep(30)
    print("ding! 30 seconds")
    return




[docs]def llim(sllim):
    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()
    dc.write("LLIM "+str(sllim)+"\n")
    p()
    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()



[docs]def ulim(sulim):
    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()
    dc.write("ULIM "+str(sulim)+"\n")
    p()
    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()




[docs]def pson():
    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()
    dc.write("PSHTR ON\n")
    p()
    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()




[docs]def psoff():
    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()
    dc.write("PSHTR OFF\n")
    p()
    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()



[docs]def swu():
    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()
    dc.write("SWEEP UP\n")
    p()
    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()




[docs]def swd():
    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()
    dc.write("SWEEP DOWN\n")
    p()
    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()




[docs]def swp():
    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()
    dc.write("SWEEP PAUSE\n")
    p()
    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()



[docs]def swz():

    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()
    dc.write("SWEEP ZERO\n")
    p()
    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()




[docs]def p():

    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()

    dc.write("IMAG?\n")
    time.sleep(0.05)
    rcvCurrent = readCurrent()
    time.sleep(0.05)
    
    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()

    dc.write("PSHTR?\n")
    time.sleep(0.05)
    rcvCurrentPSHTR = readCurrentPSHTR()
    time.sleep(0.05)

    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()

    dc.write("VMAG?\n")
    time.sleep(0.05)
    rcvvmag = readvmag()
    time.sleep(0.05)
    
    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()

    dc.write("SWEEP?\n")
    time.sleep(0.05)
    rcvsweep = readsweep()
    time.sleep(0.05)
    
    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()

    dc.write("LLIM?\n")
    time.sleep(0.05)
    rcvllim = readllim()
    time.sleep(0.05)
    
    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()

    dc.write("ULIM?\n")
    time.sleep(0.05)
    rcvulim = readulim()
    time.sleep(0.05)
    

#    print("current = " + str(rcvCurrent) + ", PSHTR = " + str(rcvCurrentPSHTR) + ", VMAG = " + str(rcvvmag) + ", SWEEP = " + str(rcvsweep) + ", LLIM = " + str(rcvllim) + ", ULIM = " + str(rcvulim))

    print("current = " + str(rcvCurrent))
    print("PSHTR = " + str(rcvCurrentPSHTR))
    print("VMAG = " + str(rcvvmag))
    print("SWEEP = " + str(rcvsweep))
    print("LLIM = " + str(rcvllim))
    print("ULIM = " + str(rcvulim))
    
    dc.flushInput()
    dc.flushOutput()



##############################################################


[docs]def readCurrent():
    rCurrent = ""

    while True: 

        chCurrent = dc.read()
        rCurrent +=chCurrent
        if chCurrent=='\n': #and flagA==0:
            rCurrent = ""

        if chCurrent==' ': #and flagA==1:
            return rCurrent



[docs]def readvmag():
    rvmag = ""
    while True: 

        chvmag = dc.read()
        rvmag +=chvmag
        if chvmag=='\n': #and flagA==0:
            rvmag = ""

        if chvmag==' ': #and flagA==1:
            dc.flushInput()
            dc.flushOutput()
            return rvmag



[docs]def readsweep():
    rsweep = ""
    while True: 

        chsweep = dc.read()
        #rsweep +=chsweep
        #if chsweep==' ': #and flagA==0:
            #rsweep = ""

        if chsweep=='p': #and flagA==1:
            chsweep = dc.read()
            rsweep = ""
            chsweep = dc.read()
            rsweep +=chsweep

            return rsweep



[docs]def readllim():
    rllim = ""
    while True: 

        chllim = dc.read()
        rllim +=chllim
        if chllim=='\n': #and flagA==0:
            rllim = ""

        if chllim==' ': #and flagA==1:
            return rllim



[docs]def readulim():
    rulim = ""
    while True: 

        chulim = dc.read()
        rulim +=chulim
        if chulim=='\n': #and flagA==0:
            rulim = ""

        if chulim==' ': #and flagA==1:
            return rulim




[docs]def readCurrentPSHTR():
    rCurrent = ""
    #flagA = 0
    while True: 

        chCurrent = dc.read()
        rCurrent +=chCurrent
        if chCurrent=='R':
            rCurrent = ""
            dc.read()
            dc.read()
            dc.read()
            rCurrent = dc.read()
            return rCurrent

#        if chCurrent=='0' or chCurrent=='1' and flagA == 1:
#            return rCurrent



[docs]def close():
    dc.close()
    exit()


#################################################################


if __name__=="__main__":
    
    dc=serial.Serial("/dev/ttyUSB1", baudrate=9600, bytesize=serial.EIGHTBITS, parity=serial.PARITY_NONE, stopbits=serial.STOPBITS_ONE, timeout=0.1) #JLab magnet

    print("Do p() to query relevant parameters\n\nType llim(<current>) or ulim(<current>) to change the lower or upper limits\n\nType pson(), psoff() and then sw{u,d,p,z}() to sweep up, down, pause, zero")
